scripts.build: npm install && npm prune && npm run build:css && npm run build:css-min && npm run build:js
scripts.clean:js:www: find www/app -type f -name "*.js" -exec node node_modules/.bin/js-beautify -r --config dev_tools/js_beautify_config.json {} \;
scripts.clean:js: find config www/app views controllers lib -type f -name "*.js*" -exec node node_modules/.bin/js-beautify -r --config dev_tools/js_beautify_config.json {} \;
scripts.clean:html: find views -type f -name "*.html" -exec node node_modules/.bin/js-beautify -r --config dev_tools/js_beautify_config.json {} \;
scripts.clean: npm run clean:js && npm run clean:js:www && npm run clean:html
